divs: Sighting Detailsmy fiance and i were watching the fireworks over the house my fiance is a pilot of 25 years we both saw in the eastern sky at around 10 thousand feet traveling frow east to west at oprox 300 to 450 miles an hour a very bright glowing orange disk shaped light opprox 150 foot wingspan with no visable fusalage we were standing facing the south and it went west till it seemed to dissapear into itself it didnt fly off fast and it didnt seem to change its speed at all it dissapeared over the coast almost by the moon the only sound we heard was the fireworks in the area .... no visable landing lights and traveling the opposite way then flying into st pete or tampa airspace and no sound at all please let us know if any other sightings of this craft on july 3 2011 ...
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Hudson
There were no other sightings in Hudson on or around July 3rd 2011
Summary: very bright orange red glow round disk shape
